price: ដោយពួកគេអង្គុយផ្អែកនៅលើខ្នើយដែលមានស្រោម ពណ៌បៃតង ព្រមទាំងកំរាលព្រំដ៏ល្អប្រណីត។
arabic: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ رَفۡرَفٍ خُضۡرٖ وَعَبۡقَرِيٍّ حِسَانٖ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: muttakiīna ʿalā rafrafin khuḍ'rin waʿabqariyyin ḥisānin
